name: The Siren (GiapetGames)
description:
A Siren is a creature in Greek mythology, the creature would lure unsuspecting sailors to them with their endearing voices and singing. This game takes this mythical creature and puts it in a horror setting where you must survive and avoid the mythical monster's grasp.

Plot:In the big city of Granite California, it is rumored that people that go to the city's beach alone end up disappearing. The only confirmation of the fates of these victims are patches of skin floating in the water, the murderer has not been identified. Timothy gathers up the courage to go to the beach all on his own to find what is happening to all these people, what he finds though is not what he expects.

Controls:

A and D to move left and right

Shift to sprint

W and S to go through doors

Get the soundtrack!:https://giapetmusic.bandcamp.com/album/the-siren-ost
